scripts.copy-tinymce: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = path.join('node_modules', 'tinymce'); const dest = path.join('public', 'tinymce'); if (fs.existsSync(dest)) { fs.rmSync(dest, { recursive: true }); } fs.cpSync(src, dest, { recursive: true }); console.log('TinyMCE files copied to public/tinymce');"
